reviewText:
Destined to be a National Geographic classic.  This program is so well done!  It shows so clearly what invasive species can do to ecosystems.
Every high school kid in America should see this!  I very highly recommend it!  Another Nat Geo masterpiece!!

A good introduction to some of the wildlife in Hawaii and how a few species which arrived there evolved into unique species. The description of how man and other animals have arrived and altered the life and landscape of the islands.
